tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patents (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patent_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  invention_description TEXT,
  inventor_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  filing_date DATE,
  approval_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE patents (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    inventor VARCHAR(255),
    patent_number VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
    filing_date DATE,
    patent_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE legal_documents (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    document_type VARCHAR(50),
    document_date DATE,
    document_description TEXT,
    related_patent INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (related_patent) REFERENCES patents(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE patents (
   patent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   title VARCHAR(255),
   inventor VARCHAR(255),
   filing_date DATE,
   description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE patent_rights (
   patent_id INT,
   investor_id INT,
   license_type VARCHAR(50),
   grant_date DATE,
   expiration_date DATE,
   PRIMARY KEY (patent_id, investor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patents (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patent_number VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    invention_title TEXT NOT NULL,
    inventor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    filing_date DATE NOT NULL,
    abstract TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE patent_documents (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    document_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    document_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    document_content BYTEA NOT NULL,
    patent_id UUID REFERENCES patents(id)
);

CREATE TABLE patent_history (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    event_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    event_date DATE NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    patent_id UUID REFERENCES patents(id)
);
